articles.description: A close at or below 12,845.95 would meet the commonly used definition of a bear market
articles.content: The Nasdaq Composite was trading sharply lower Wednesday as investors focused on the simmering Ukraine-Russia conflict, pulling the technology-laden index toward its first bear market in about two ye… [+2012 chars]

articles.title: Tesla vehicles with 3G modems are starting to lose connectivity as the networks are shutting down - Electrek.co
articles.description: Early Tesla vehicles still equipped with 3G modems are starting to lose connectivity as 3G networks are shutting down, but there are still ways around it. From the start, Tesla has made sure that its vehicles all come with an internet connection. It was impor…
